data.comment: There are 250 people in the crowd for today's match.
The match has started at Opel Arena.
Ball safe as Mainz is awarded a throw-in in their half.
In the minute 1, Throw-in for Mainz in the half of Leverkusen.
Free kick Leverkusen.
Throw-in for Mainz at Opel Arena.
In the minute 3, Bastian Dankert signals a free kick to Mainz.
Mainz are whistled for offside.
Throw-in for Mainz in their own half.
In the minute 5, Mainz have a goal kick.
In Mainz a free kick has been awarded the away team.
Leverkusen's Leon Bailey misses with an attempt on goal.
In the minute 7, It's a goal kick for the home team in Mainz.
Bastian Dankert signals a Mainz throw-in in Leverkusen's half.
Bastian Dankert signals a throw-in for Leverkusen, close to Mainz's area.
In the minute 10, Bastian Dankert awards the away team a throw-in.
Mainz are caught offside.
Mainz have been awarded a corner by Bastian Dankert.
In the minute 12, Mainz awarded a throw-in in their own half.
A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
Leverkusen to take a throw-in in Mainz territory.
In the minute 15, Leverkusen drive upfield and Daley Sinkgraven gets in a shot. The strike is blocked by a Mainz defender.
Throw-in for Leverkusen close to the penalty box.
Throw-in Leverkusen.
In the minute 17, Free kick for Leverkusen in the half of Mainz.
Can Mainz get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Leverkusen's half?
Bastian Dankert awards Leverkusen a goal kick.
In the minute 22, Bastian Dankert signals a free kick to Leverkusen.
Ball goes out of play for a Mainz goal kick.
Throw-in for Leverkusen in their own half.
In the minute 25, Can Mainz get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Leverkusen's half?
Mainz are coming forward and Jonathan Michael Burkardt gets in a strike, it misses the target, however.
Goal kick for Leverkusen at Opel Arena.
In the minute 27, Mainz push upfield but Bastian Dankert quickly pulls them for offside.
Can Leverkusen capitalize from this throw-in deep inside Mainz's half?
Bastian Dankert signals a Leverkusen throw-in in Mainz's half.
In the minute 30, Corner awarded to Leverkusen.
Goal! A Lucas Alario header gives Leverkusen a 0-1 lead in Mainz.
Leon Bailey with an assist there.
In the minute 31, Mainz to take a throw-in in Leverkusen territory.
Throw-in Leverkusen.
Leverkusen's Daley Sinkgraven gets his shot away but it misses the target.
In the minute 33, Bastian Dankert awards Mainz a goal kick.
Bastian Dankert signals a free kick to Leverkusen in their own half.
Leverkusen awarded a throw-in in their own half.
In the minute 34, Throw-in for Mainz at Opel Arena.
Mainz have a goal kick.
At Opel Arena, Leverkusen are penalized for being offside.
In the minute 39, In Mainz a free kick has been awarded the home team.
Pierre Kunde (Mainz) gets in a strike but the shot is blocked by a defender.
It's a goal kick for the away team in Mainz.
In the minute 41, Leverkusen are pushing forward but Leon Bailey's finish is wide of the goal.
Ball goes out of play for a Mainz goal kick.
Bastian Dankert awards the home team a throw-in.
In the minute 44, In Mainz, Mainz push forward quickly but are pulled up for offside.
Free kick for Mainz in their own half.
Leverkusen have been awarded a corner by Bastian Dankert.
In the minute 45, Bastian Dankert blows against Leverkusen's Leon Bailey for offside.
The first half has been concluded at Opel Arena.
The second-half has started.
In the minute 46, Julian Baumgartlinger is replacing Charles Aranguiz for Leverkusen at Opel Arena.
Moussa Diaby (Leverkusen) goes for goal but the shot is blocked by an alert defence.
Corner awarded to Mainz.
In the minute 48, Ball safe as Leverkusen is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Ball safe as Mainz is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Throw-in for Mainz at Opel Arena.
In the minute 52, Leverkusen awarded a free kick in their own half.
Leverkusen drives forward and Nadiem Amiri gets in a shot. Without netting, however.
Leverkusen awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 54, Goal kick for Leverkusen at Opel Arena.
Mainz have been awarded a corner by Bastian Dankert.
Mainz push forward at Opel Arena and Levin Oztunali gets in a strike. This is blocked, however, by a determined Leverkusen defence.
In the minute 57, Leverkusen push upfield and Lucas Alario gets his head to the ball. The attempt is cleared by an alert Mainz defence.
Free kick for Mainz in their own half.
Lars Bender is booked for the away team.
In the minute 58, The home team have replaced Pierre Kunde with Edimilson Fernandes. This is the first substitution made today by Jan Moritz Lichte.
Jan Moritz Lichte (Mainz) is making a second substitution, with Robin Quaison replacing Jonathan Michael Burkardt.
Bastian Dankert awards the away team a throw-in.
In the minute 60, Leverkusen awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Bastian Dankert signals a free kick to Leverkusen just outside Mainz's area.
Corner awarded to Mainz.
In the minute 63, Nadiem Amiri of Leverkusen smashes in a shot on target. The keeper saves, though.
Free kick Mainz.
Jean-Paul Boetius of Mainz gets in a strike, but is off target.
In the minute 66, Goal kick for Leverkusen at Opel Arena.
It's a goal kick for the home team in Mainz.
Mainz have been awarded a corner by Bastian Dankert.
In the minute 68, Throw-in Mainz.
Peter Bosz is making the team's second substitution at Opel Arena with Karim Bellarabi replacing Leon Bailey.
Exequiel Palacios is replacing Kerem Demirbay for Leverkusen at Opel Arena.
In the minute 69, Jan Moritz Lichte (Mainz) is making a third substitution, with Karim Onisiwo replacing Levin Oztunali.
Throw-in for Leverkusen in the half of Mainz.
Throw-in for Mainz in their own half.
In the minute 72, A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
Mainz to take a throw-in in Leverkusen territory.
Bastian Dankert awards Leverkusen a goal kick.
In the minute 75, Free kick for Leverkusen in the half of Mainz.
Bastian Dankert signals a free kick to Mainz in their own half.
At Opel Arena, Danny Latza has been yellow-carded for the home team.
In the minute 76, Corner awarded to Mainz.
Throw-in Leverkusen.
A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
Throw-in for Leverkusen in the half of Mainz.
Dong Won Ji is replacing Jean-Philippe Mateta for the home team.
In the minute 77, Paul Nebel is on a sub for Danny Latza for Mainz.
In the minute 78, It's getting dangerous! Free kick for Mainz close to the penalty box.
Mainz are too eager and fall into an offside trap.
Ball safe as Mainz is awarded a throw-in in their half.
In the minute 80, Leverkusen advance rapidly upfield but Bastian Dankert blows for offside.
Ball goes out of play for a Leverkusen goal kick.
Bastian Dankert signals a Mainz throw-in in Leverkusen's half.
In the minute 83, Throw-in high up the field for Mainz in Mainz.
Mainz have a dangerous throw-in.
Leverkusen push upfield but Bastian Dankert quickly pulls them for offside.
In the minute 85, Bastian Dankert signals a free kick to Leverkusen.
Edimilson Fernandes for Mainz has been booked by Bastian Dankert and receives a first yellow card.
Free kick Leverkusen.
In the minute 86, Mainz's Dong Won Ji has been booked in Mainz.
Throw-in for Leverkusen in their own half.
Mainz's Edimilson Fernandes gets in a shot but it is blocked by a Leverkusen defender.
In the minute 88, Can Mainz get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Leverkusen's half?
Throw-in for Mainz at Opel Arena.
Free kick for Leverkusen in their own half.
Free kick for Leverkusen in the half of Mainz.
Can Leverkusen get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Mainz's half?
In Mainz a free kick has been awarded the away team.
The 2nd half is prolonged by 4 minutes of added time.
Mainz have a goal kick.
Bastian Dankert awards the away team a throw-in.
Leverkusen awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Leverkusen to take a throw-in in Mainz territory.
The whistle has gone to end the second half. The match finishes 0-1.
